table.caption: Table 367 â€” Sub-block level structure type
head: Structure Type
Category
Description
rows:
(PDF 2.0) (Sub-division of a block level element) Encloses content typically perceived as a sub-division inside a block level structure element.
A Lbl structure element may be used inside a Sub structure element to enclose a line number, verse number or similar, if present.
If a Sub structure element is used, all other content inside the same block level element that is the parent of the Sub structure element, is also enclosed in Sub structure elements.
Examples:
